column28: Be careful posting hashes of passwords in public forums. Although it doesn't make any difference in this case, if you had chosen a secret password, posting the hash would allow brute-force cracking to begin. MySQL hashes are not stretched which makes them relatively quick to crack if the password choice is poor.
